entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:35 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 2:00 PM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 39 %
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the afternoon. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
